name: serverless-api
description: 1. Create your project folder. 2. Inside the folder, ```sls create -t aws-nodejs``` 3. Create features folder. 4. Inside the features folder, create the following 4 files.     - create.js     - read.js     - update.js     - delete.js 5. read.js     - copy the content of handler.js to read.js     - delete handler.js     - adjust read.js
